scripts.docker-build: docker build -t cayley-broker . && docker tag cayley-broker memoid.space/cayley-broker
scripts.hyper-run: hyper rm -f cayley-broker && hyper run -d --name cayley-broker --link cayley --link kafka memoid.space/cayley-broker
scripts.hyper: npm run build && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && npm run hyper-run && npm run hyper-logs
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config lib/index.js dotenv_config_silent=true
